title: VR-Based Short-Intensive Science Experiment Skill Acquisition Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and no experience with laboratory equipment
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment combining VR simulations and hands-on experiments using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: VR simulation enables the performance of pipetting techniques with over 80% accuracy.
In virtual lab environments, learners achieve 90% self-correction capability when errors occur.
Learners transfer and apply VR-acquired skills in real laboratories with over 70% effectiveness.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
